experiences.job_desc:
Responsibilities:

  • Worked on various website development projects for individual clients and small to medium-sized businesses.
  • Experienced in creating responsive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, as well as frameworks such as Laravel, React.js, Next.js and CMS platforms such as WordPress.
  • Assist clients with customization needs, API integration, basic SEO optimization, and hosting/domain management.
  • Focused on creating user-friendly websites that are fast and aligned with client business needs, utilizing Bootstrap or Tailwind CSS for responsive and modern designs.
  • Committed to providing creative, timely, and result-oriented solutions.

Project: Accounting

Responsibilities:

  • Using GIT for version control.
  • Convert Figma designs into responsive React.js components using Bootstrap to speed up UI development.
  • Integrating the API into the React.js project.
  • Upgrading the Laravel application from version 9 to 11.
  • Using Docker for development environment management.
  • Performing bug fixing on React.js and Laravel applications to improve system stability and performance.

Project: Application Portfolio Management (APM) & DQ Rules

Responsibilities:

  • Using GIT for version control.
  • Slicing the design from PSD to React.js with a focus on visual accuracy and responsiveness, and using Bootstrap to speed up UI development.
  • Integrated APIs into React.js applications to enhance application functionality.
  • Developed backend APIs using Golang to meet system requirements and ensure scalability.
  • Performing bug fixing on React.js and Laravel applications to improve system stability and performance.

Project: Robotic

Responsibilities:

  • Using GIT for version control.
  • Handled MySQL database operations with Sequelize ORM to streamline data management.
  • Developed RESTful APIs using Node.js to support backend services.
  • Built and maintained the web server with Node.js to ensure optimal performance.
  • Converted PSD designs into Express.js applications for web service implementation.
  • Implemented real-time control functionality using Socket.io for robotic operations.
  • Used Bootstrap to build a responsive and consistent user interface.
  • Deployed applications to a staging VPS server for testing and pre-production validation.

Project: DuniaGames

Responsibilities:

  • Using GIT for version control.
  • Converted PSD designs into Angular components to ensure responsive and pixel-perfect implementation.
  • Integrated APIs into Angular applications to enhance functionality and user interaction.
  • Used Bootstrap to build a responsive and consistent user interface.
  • Performed bug fixing and feature enhancements on Angular applications to improve performance and stability.
  • Deployed applications to staging and production environments using Ubuntu OS, utilizing terminal commands and FileZilla for file management.

Project: E-sports Platform

Responsibilities:

  • Using GIT for version control.
  • Slicing design from PSD to Laravel and Vue.js based application, ensuring responsive and design compliant implementation.
  • Used Bootstrap to build a responsive and consistent user interface for both Laravel and Vue.js applications.
  • Implementation of Laravel integration into Vue.js.
  • Handle bug fixing and feature improvements in Laravel and Vue.js to improve application stability and performance.

Responsibilities:

  • Developed websites using WordPress, from theme setup and customization to plugin integration, ensuring enhanced functionality.
  • Designed and developed landing page using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap to provide an optimal and responsive user experience.
  • Managed and set up cPanel servers for clients using WHM (Web Host Manager) and cPanel, ensuring efficient and secure hosting management.
